attributes.action: Make working from home a compulsory option if it’s worked for the past 14+ month
attributes.additional_details: My manager wants us back to the office second part of this year! Our company had record breaking turnover 2020 ! Working from home totally worked !! Each day between 5 of us we will be travelling 160miles plus  round trip! That’s an additional 41k + miles per year of unnecessary driving just between 5 people ! This alone should be a reason to keep people working from home. As a single parent I’ve been able to care for my child around work in school holidays and saves thousands in child care too!
attributes.background: Please make working from home or hybrid working a compulsory option to all employees if it suits them better! Pros less cars on the road, less stress, better mental health, being a single working mum it’s totally changed my life for the better working from home the last 14months!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570934
